name: Amazing Cucumber Basil Salad
author: RainbowJewels
summary: I created this salad because I had lots of fresh veggies and herbs from my garden that needed using up. It is so good, and because it makes its own dressing, it's very healthy as well. The flavor is best when left in the fridge overnight.
ingredients: 1 pound campari tomatoes, seeded and minced
2 large  seedless cucumbers, peeled and minced
1 teaspoon cracked black pepper, or to taste
directions: Run spinach and basil through a food processor until finely chopped
Mix spinach mixture, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onion, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl with an air-tight lid
Cover bowl and refrigerate salad, 8 hours to overnight
